Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® Heparin Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® Heparin Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit to verify calibration and linearity for Heparin Anti-Xa activity testing on IL ACL TOP 500 instruments.
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed quality control material for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range for Heparin Anti-Xa activity on automated instruments in a clinical laboratory setting.
